mapper.insert: insert into BEUSE_400 (NEW_ID, BIG_CODE, EXT_CODE, OCCUPY) values (#{newId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupy,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into BEUSE_400
NEW_ID,
BIG_CODE,
EXT_CODE,
OCCUPY,
#{newId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bigCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{occupy,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.select: select top 1 NEW_ID, BIG_CODE, EXT_CODE, EXT_CODE, OCCUPY from BEUSE_400 where OCCUPY = #{occupy}
mapper.update: update BEUSE_400 set OCCUPY = #{occupy} where BIG_CODE = #{bigCode} and EXT_CODE = #{extCode}
